casebody.data:
IN RE: B.O.A. 264PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2019 Edward Eldred, Attorney at Law, for Barber, Lauren Erica. Holly Williamson Batten, Attorney at Law, N. Kyle Hicks, Attorney at Law, C. Gill Frazier, II, Attorney at Law, for Granville County DSS. Derek Martin Bast, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for B.O.A. Elizabeth Kennedy-Gurnee, Attorney at Law, Jamie Hamlet, Attorney at Law, for NCASSA

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of January 2019 by North Carolina Association of Social Services Attorneys for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of January 2019."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
